title: I-601 | Application for Waiver of Grounds of Inadmissibility
description: If you are inadmissible to the United States and are seeking an immigrant visa, adjustment of status, certain nonimmigrant statuses, or certain other immigration benefits, you must file this form to seek a waiver of certain grounds of inadmissibility.

forms.title: Flowchart: Filing Certain Waivers of Inadmissibility
